Formula: Thomas E.R.; Newman B.A.; Long T.C.; Wood D.A.; Eckert C.A.: Limiting Activity Coefficients of Nonpolar and Polar Solutes in both Volatile and Nonvolatile Solvents by Gas Chromatography. J.Chem.Eng.Data 27 (1982) 399-405
